official_title: To remove the limitation on the availability of funds previously appropriated to the Resolution Trust Corporation.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to extend the limitation placed on previously appropriated additional interim funds to the Resolution Trust Corporation from April 1, 1992, to May 15, 1992.

titles.title: To remove the limitation on the availability of funds previously appropriated to the Resolution Trust Corporation.
